name: His Secret Obsession - Vintage
tagline: How to refocus a man’s natural competitive drive on winning your love.
description: The 1 thing men are most obsessed with is not what you think. It’s an elusive combination of emotion and biological drive that is very rarely satisfied in life or love. When a women can satisfy this obsession, a man will please and pursue her to the ends of the earth.
